Title: A Tower Yonder
Description:
$p, I... don't want to ask more of you, but could you help us finally complete our mission?

We were ordered to investigate the Gaze of Neltharion. We were defeated on our first approach, but with an escort of two dragons and the mighty $p, I'm not as worried about the djaradin.

I want us to move out soon. Could you scout out the tower first for us?
ObjectivesText: Investigate the Gaze of Neltharion in the Sulfur Wastes.
